00020 /** \file
00021  \brief trip database stuff
00022  */
00023 
00024 #ifndef __TRIPDB_H
00025 #define __TRIPDB_H
00026 
00027 #include "sqlite3.h"
00028 
00029 /// Create the trip table in the database
00030 int createtriptable(sqlite3 *db);
00031 
00032 /// Create a new trip
00033 /** \param starttime the start time of the trip
00034  \param db the sqlite3 database we're using
00035  \return opaque value for passing to endtrip()
00036  */
00037 sqlite3_int64 starttrip(sqlite3 *db, double starttime);
00038 
00039 /// End a trip
00040 /** \param endtime the end time of the trip
00041  \param obdtripid the opaque value returned from starttrip()
00042  \param db the sqlite3 database we're using
00043  */
00044 void updatetrip(sqlite3 *db, sqlite3_int64 obdtripid, double endtime);
00045 
00046 
00047 #endif //__GPSDB_H
